# Welcome to the UHC Analytics Corner

### Build bridges at the UHC by open sourcing your analytic problems

- [Wide range of solutions](docs/gallery/) are support including technology recommendations, custom visualizations, dashboards, websites, packages
- Submit your analytics problem challenges by [submitting an issues](https://github.com/Drexel-UHC/analytics-core/issues/new?assignees=&labels=&template=request.yml&title=%5BRequest+title%5D%3A+) 
- Rapid prototyping to provide custom solutions 
- [Solutions](docs/blog/) are all made accessible to everyone
